info.title: Tessie API Library
info.description: Complete OpenAPI specification for all functions in the Tessie API Python library.

tags.name: Battery Health
tags.description: Endpoints related to battery health and degradation.

tags.name: Charging
tags.description: Endpoints for controlling and managing charging.

tags.name: Charges
tags.description: Endpoints for viewing charging history and costs.

tags.name: State
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving current vehicle state and information.

tags.name: Drives
tags.description: Endpoints for drive history and paths.

tags.name: Historical States
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving historical vehicle states.

tags.name: Scheduling
tags.description: Endpoints for charging and departure scheduling.

tags.name: Share
tags.description: Endpoints for sharing data to vehicle.

parameters.name: on
parameters.description: Enable or disable cabin overheat protection

200.description: States of all vehicles retrieved successfully

tag.description: Tag to set for the drives

ClimateKeeperMode.description: Climate keeper mode: 0 = Disable, 1 = Keep Mode, 2 = Dog Mode, 3 = Camp Mode

BearerAuth.description: API key authentication using Bearer token
